com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.theme

Class PThemeIconLoaderFixedDimensionFromPngFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.theme.PThemeIconLoaderAbstract
      • com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.theme.PThemeIconLoaderAbstractFixedDimension
        • com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.theme.PThemeIconLoaderFixedDimensionFromPngFile

  • @FullyTested
public class PThemeIconLoaderFixedDimensionFromPngFile
extends PThemeIconLoaderAbstractFixedDimension
    Implementation of PThemeIconLoaderAbstractFixedDimension to load PNG images from file.
    Author:
    Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    PThemeIconLoaderAbstractFixedDimension, PThemeIconLoaderAbstract

    • Field Detail

      • FILE_EXTENSION

        public static final String FILE_EXTENSION
        Does not include the dot -- only "png". Case matters in most file systems!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • PThemeIconLoaderFixedDimensionFromPngFile

        public PThemeIconLoaderFixedDimensionFromPngFile(PImmutableDimension fixedDimension,
                                         File baseDirPath)
                                          throws com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.exception.PathException
        Creates a theme icon loader for PNG icons stored as files on disk.
        Parameters:
        fixedDimension - dimension for icons to load. Must not be null
        baseDirPath - base directory path to icon files on disk, e.g., "resources/theme-xyz/icons". Must not be null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if fixedDimension or baseDirPath is null
        com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.exception.PathException -
        • with reason PathException.PathExceptionReason.PATH_DOES_NOT_EXIST if baseDirPath does not exist
        • with reason PathException.PathExceptionReason.PATH_IS_FILE if baseDirPath exists, but is not a directory
        com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.exception.PathException

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseDirPath

        public File getBaseDirPath()
        Base directory path to icon files on disk, e.g., "resources/theme-xyz/icons"

      • getUrl

        protected URL getUrl(PThemeIconName name)
        Creates a file path-based URL for the theme icon. These are the file path parts:
        1. getBaseDirPath()
        2. getFixedDimension().description
          • PThemeIconLoaderAbstractFixedDimension.getFixedDimension()
          • PImmutableDimension.getDescription()
        3. name.context.dirName
          • PThemeIconName.context
          • PThemeIconContextName.dirName
        4. name.baseFileName + "." + FILE_EXTENSION
          • PThemeIconName.baseFileName

        Example: PThemeIconName.ADDRESS_BOOK_NEW may map to "img/32x32/actions/address-book-new.png"

        Docs from PThemeIconLoaderAbstract.getUrl(PThemeIconName):

        Creates a URL for a theme icon. Implementing classes may create URLs for file paths or classpath resources. The result is passed Toolkit.getImage(URL).

        Reference: Ref: http://standards.freedesktop.org/icon-theme-spec/icon-theme-spec-latest.html

        Specified by:
        getUrl in class PThemeIconLoaderAbstract
        Parameters:
        name - id of icon to retrieve. Must not be null
        Returns:
        URL for a theme icon, or null if not exists
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if converting file path to URL fails
        See Also:
        Toolkit.getImage(URL), PThemeIconLoaderAbstract.tryGetIcon(PThemeIconName), PThemeIconLoaderAbstract.getIcon(PThemeIconName), PThemeIconLoaderAbstract.iconExists(PThemeIconName)

      • createThemeImageIcon

        protected PThemeImageIcon createThemeImageIcon(PThemeIconName name)
        Description copied from class: PThemeIconLoaderAbstract
        Creates a new instance of PThemeImageIcon from a name. Implementations will probably use PThemeIconLoaderAbstract.getUrl(PThemeIconName).
        Specified by:
        createThemeImageIcon in class PThemeIconLoaderAbstract
        Parameters:
        name - id of icon to retrieve. Must not be null
        Returns:
        new instance of PThemeImageIcon, or null if not exists
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - thrown by getUrl(PThemeIconName) if converting file path to URL fails
